Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ سَجِيَّةٌ الشَّرَفُ مَزِيَّةٌ
enWisdom: Generosity is a [righteous] trait; honour is a virtue

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ خُلُقٌ
enWisdom: Generosity is a [virtuous] quality

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ زَيْنُ الْإِنْسَانِ
enWisdom: Generosity is the adornment of a human being

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ أَشْرَفُ عَادَةٍ
enWisdom: Generosity is the most honourable habit

Wisdom: الضِّيَافَةُ رَأْسُ الْمُرُوَّةِ [الصِّيَانَةُ أَوَّلُ الْمُرُوَّةِ]
enWisdom: Hospitality is the cornerstone of magnanimity

Wisdom: الْكَرَمُ مَعْدِنُ الْخَيْرِ
enWisdom: Nobleness is the source of goodness

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ خُلُقُ الْأَنْبِيَاءِ
enWisdom: Generosity is a quality of the Prophets

Wisdom: الْكَرَمُ أَفْضَلُ الشِّيَمِ
enWisdom: Munificence is the best of traits

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ حُبُّ السَّائِلِ وَبَذْلُ النَّائِلِ
enWisdom: Generosity is showing affection to the beggar and giving open-handedly

Wisdom: السَّيِّدُ مَنْ تَحَمَّلَ الْمَئُونَةَ وَجَادَ بِالْمَعُونَةِ
enWisdom: The eminent person is one who bears the responsibility of providing [for others] and is generous with his assistance

Wisdom: الْكَرِيمُ مَنْ جَاءَ [جَادَ] بِالْمَوْجُودِ
enWisdom: The munificent person is one who brings [and gives away] whatever is available

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ إِحْدَى السَّعَادَتَيْنِ
enWisdom: Generosity is one of the two felicities

Wisdom: الْجُودُ فِي اللَّهِ عِبَادَةُ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
enWisdom: Generosity for the sake of Allah is the worship of those who are close [to Allah]

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ وَالشَّجَاعَةُ غَرَائِزُ شَرِيفَةٌ يَضَعُهَا اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ فِيمَنْ أَحَبَّهُ وَامْتَحَنَهُ
enWisdom: Generosity and courage are honourable instincts which Allah, the Glorified, puts in the one whom He loves and has subjected to trials

Wisdom: الْكَرَمُ إِيثَارُ عُذُوبَةِ الثَّنَاءِ عَلَى حُبِّ الْمَالِ
enWisdom: Nobleness is [in] preferring the pleasantness of praise over the love of wealth

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ أَنْ تَكُونَ بِمَالِكَ مُتَبَرِّعاً وَعَنْ مَالِ غَيْرِكَ مُتَوَرِّعاً
enWisdom: Generosity means being open-handed with your [own] wealth while being cautious with the wealth of others

Wisdom: إِعْطَاءُ هَذَا الْمَالِ فِي حُقُوقِ اللَّهِ دَخْلٌ [دَاخِلٌ‏] فِي بَابِ الْجُودِ
enWisdom: Giving this wealth in order to fulfil the rights of Allah has been made part of generosity

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ ثَمَرَةُ الْعَقْلِ وَالْقَنَاعَةُ بُرْهَانُ النُّبْلِ
enWisdom: Generosity is the fruit of the intellect and contentment is the evidence of nobility

Wisdom: النُّبْلُ بِالتَّحَلِّي بِالْجُودِ وَالْوَفَاءُ بِالْعُهُودِ
enWisdom: Nobility is [attained] by adorning [oneself] with generosity and fulfilling [one’s] promises

Wisdom: الْكَرِيمُ مَنْ صَانَ عِرْضَهُ بِمَالِهِ وَاللَّئِيمُ مَنْ صَانَ مَالَهُ بِعِرْضِهِ
enWisdom: A noble-minded person is one who safeguards his honour with his wealth while the wicked person is one safeguards his wealth by [sacrificing] his honour

Wisdom: السَّخَاءُ وَالْحَيَاءُ أَفْضَلُ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: Generosity and shame are the best characteristics

Wisdom: انْسَ رِفْدَكَ اذْكُرْ وَعْدَكَ
enWisdom: Forget your gift, [and] remember your promise

Wisdom: ابْذُلْ مَالَكَ فِي الْحُقُوقِ وَوَاسِ بِهِ الصَّدِيقَ فَإِنَّ السَّخَاءَ بِالْحُرِّ أَخْلَقُ
enWisdom: Donate your wealth generously towards righteous works and support your friend[s] with it, for indeed generosity is a more befitting trait for the free

Wisdom: أَشْجَعُ النَّاسِ أَسْخَاهُمْ
enWisdom: The most courageous of people is the most generous of them

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْمَكَارِمِ الْجُودُ
enWisdom: The most excellent of noble traits is generosity

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ النَّاسِ السَّخِيُّ الْمُوقِنُ
enWisdom: The most excellent person is the generous one who possesses certitude

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ النَّاسِ عَيْشاً مَنْ عَاشَ النَّاسُ فِي فَضْلِهِ
enWisdom: Of all the people, the person who has the best lifestyle is one in whose grace other people live

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ النَّاسِ فِي الدُّنْيَا الْأَسْخِيَاءُ وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ الْأَتْقِيَاءُ
enWisdom: The best people in this world are the generous ones, and in the Hereafter, the God-wary

Wisdom: أَكْرَمُ الْأَخْلَاقِ السَّخَاءُ وَأَعَمُّهَا نَفْعاً الْعَدْلُ
enWisdom: The most honourable of qualities is generosity, and the most universal in benefit is justice

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ السَّخَاءِ أَنْ تَكُونَ بِمَالِكَ مُتَبَرِّعاً وَعَنْ مَالِ غَيْرِكَ مُتَوَرِّعاً
enWisdom: The best [form of] generosity is for you to be open-handed with your wealth while being cautious with the wealth of others

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الشِّيَمِ السَّخَاءُ وَالْعِفَّةُ وَالسَّكِينَةُ
enWisdom: The best of qualities are generosity, chastity and tranquillity

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْفَضَائِلِ بَذْلُ الرَّغَائِبِ وَإِسْعَافُ الطَّالِبِ وَالْإِجْمَالُ فِي الْمَطَالِبِ
enWisdom: The best of virtues is granting the wishes and fulfilling the needs of the seeker and being moderate in what one seeks

Wisdom: إِنَّ إِعْطَاءَ هَذَا الْمَالِ قِنْيَةٌ وَإِنَّ إِمْسَاكَهُ فِتْنَةٌ
enWisdom: Verily giving away this wealth is an acquisition [for the Hereafter] and withholding it is an affliction

Wisdom: إِنَّ إِنْفَاقَ هَذَا الْمَالِ فِي طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ أَعْظَمُ نِعْمَةٍ وَإِنَّ إِنْفَاقَهُ فِي مَعَاصِيهِ أَعْظَمُ مِحْنَةٍ
enWisdom: Verily spending this wealth in obedience to Allah is the greatest blessing and spending it in disobedience to Him is the greatest tribulation

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يُحِبُّ كُلَّ سَمْحِ الْيَدَيْنِ حَرِيزِ الدِّينِ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, loves everyone who is open-handed and strong in faith

Wisdom: بَذْلُ الْيَدِ بِالْعَطِيَّةِ أَجْمَلُ مَنْقَبَةٍ وَأَفْضَلُ سَجِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: Extending the hand in giving is the most beautiful virtue and the most excellent trait

Wisdom: تَأْمِيلُ النَّاسِ نَوَالَكَ خَيْرٌ مِنْ خَوْفِهِمْ نَكَالَكَ
enWisdom: The peoples’ expectation of your kindness is better than their fear of your retribution

Wisdom: تَحَلَّ بِالسَّخَاءِ وَالْوَرَعِ فَهُمَا حِلْيَةُ الْإِيمَانِ وَأَشْرَفُ خِلَالِكَ
enWisdom: Adorn yourself with generosity and piety, for these two are the embellishments of faith and the most honourable of your traits

Wisdom: جُودُ الْفَقِيرِ أَفْضَلُ الْجُودِ
enWisdom: The generosity of the poor is the best generosity

Wisdom: جُودُوا بِالْمَوْجُودِ وَأَنْجِزُوا الْوُعُودَ وَأَوْفُوا بِالْعُهُودِ
enWisdom: Be generous with what is available, fulfil your promises and be loyal with the trusts [that have been entrusted to you]

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْمَكَارِمِ الْإِيثَارُ
enWisdom: The best of noble traits is altruism

Wisdom: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ كَانَ فِي يُسْرِهِ سَخِيّاً شَكُوراً
enWisdom: The best person is one who is generous and thankful in times of prosperity

Wisdom: زَكَاةُ الْجَاهِ بَذْلُهُ
enWisdom: The alms-tax of high rank [and power] is benefitting others with it

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالسَّخَاءِ فَإِنَّهُ ثَمَرَةُ الْعَقْلِ
enWisdom: Espouse generosity, for indeed it is the fruit of the intellect

Wisdom: كُنْ بِمَالِكَ مُتَبَرِّعاً وَعَنْ مَالِ غَيْرِكَ مُتَوَرِّعاً
enWisdom: Be a [generous] donor with your [own] wealth while being cautious with the wealth of others

Wisdom: لِيُرَ عَلَيْكَ أَثَرُ مَا أَنْعَمَ اللَّهُ بِهِ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: Let the effect of what Allah has blessed you with be visible on you

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ سَجِيَّتُكَ السَّخَاءَ وَالْإِحْسَانَ
enWisdom: Let your traits be generosity and benevolence

Wisdom: لَوْ رَأَيْتُمُ السَّخَاءَ رَجُلًا لَرَأَيْتُمُوهُ حَسَناً يَسُرُّ النَّاظِرِينَ
enWisdom: If you were to see generosity in the form of a man, you would surely see him as a handsome person, pleasing to look at

Wisdom: مَنْ جَادَ اصْطَنَعَ
enWisdom: One who is open-handed does good to others

Wisdom: مِنْ كَمَالِ النِّعْمَةِ التَّحَلِّي بِالسَّخَاءِ وَالتَّعَفُّفِ
enWisdom: Being adorned with generosity and chastity is one of the most perfect blessings

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْمَكَارِمِ تَحَمُّلُ الْمَغَارِمِ وَإِقْرَاءُ الضُّيُوفِ
enWisdom: From the best noble deeds is bearing the liabilities [and debts of others] and being hospitable to one’s guests

Wisdom: مَا أَحْسَنَ الْجُودَ مَعَ الْإِعْسَارِ
enWisdom: How excellent is generosity when in straitened circumstances!

Wisdom: مَا شُكِرَتِ النِّعَمُ بِمِثْلِ بَذْلِهَا
enWisdom: Nothing shows gratitude for favors like bestowing them on others

Wisdom: مَا أَحْسَنَ بِالْإِنْسَانِ أَنْ يَقْنَعَ بِالْقَلِيلِ وَيَجُودَ بِاْلَجِزيِل
enWisdom: How good it is for a person to be contented with little and generous with much!

Wisdom: نِعْمَ السَّجِيَّةُ السَّخَاءُ
enWisdom: What a good trait generosity is!

Wisdom: لَا فَضِيلَةَ كَالسَّخَاءِ
enWisdom: There is no merit like generosity

Wisdom: لَا فَخْرَ فِي الْمَالِ إِلَّا مَعَ الْجُودِ
enWisdom: There is no pride in wealth except when accompanied with generosity

Wisdom: لَا يجوز [يَحُوزُ الشُّكْرَ إِلَّا مَنْ بَذَلَ مَالَهُ
enWisdom: No one acquires gratitude except by giving [generously] from his wealth

Wisdom: لَا يَكْمُلُ الشَّرَفُ إِلَّا بِالسَّخَاءِ وَالتَّوَاضُعِ
enWisdom: Honour is not perfected except through generosity and humility
